text: Can someone explain the h tag issue? I am using the wave tool and can't find this on any site I built
what is it that you are referring to?
I'm trying to understand the htag issue
with google site search transitioning to custom search engine only, how are you guys handling the ads? I obviously don't want competitor ads showing in the search results in our sites?
HubSpot is supposed to be rolling out a first-party search solution before the switch
Haven't heard a status update about it in a while though
We're still working on Site Search. Hoping to get it into beta soon, but we'll let everyone here know when it's ready to try out.

<@U25PYL3Q8> I think the only H tag issue (at least for wcag) is that they need be well formed and strutured (<https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/H42.html>).  Don't have h1 inside of h2's, don't have h3's if you don't have h1 and h2 already, etc.  remember WAVE is not 100%. The only way to have your site verified is by a manual audit.  At least here in the US, there are no official certification or anything. If you get sued, then it's just a matter of having a professional review your site and present the findings to the judge. In a case we're going through right now with Department of Education, there's a lawyer assigned to our case that has a team literally use the site as non-sighted or impaired users and then they decide if it's usable or not.
oh wow.  that would be huge. <@U22PU4G4A> is the plan to have it out before the switch?
That is definitely the goal <@U98Q2GNL9>. We're pretty close, just need a few more things to come before it. :slightly_smiling_face:
I understand, This is the first I heard of a tool that checked it out.  I was really having more issues understanding his specific htag issue as it didn't make sense to me
but thank you for the info <@U98Q2GNL9> -- I know this is something we are tackling this year
great. thanks
<@U26BLKGE4> <@U98Q2GNL9> If you want to be in the private beta, DM me and I'll add you to the search feedback group.
Will do, thanks Matt!
You can also sign up for AdSense and have some control on the ads that are shown in your results
Anyone having trouble accessing HubSpot Integrations?
<https://status.HubSpot.com/incidents/dz3ny23655qr?utm_source=slack>

So I asked this in the partner channel but not hearing back, for HubSpots Impact awards, is there ever going to be a category for COS Customization? I mean as a whole, this community has posted some pretty cool things we've done for customers from using HubDB to build blogs/image galleries and other things. I feel like that work (depending on the site) may not fit into any already existing categories.
^ Either that, or bring back the Hack-A-Thon, there were some gems in there
<@U25PYL3Q8> I believe he is commenting on his question about new ADA compliance requirements and how they would make dev difficult
So a Hub-A-Thon :slightly_smiling_face:

Maybe I'm trying to wrap my head around why you would make your htags in a different order. Put classes on your htags for their styling. h tags are for heirarcy. I'm just having a hard time understanding how it makes anything more difficult.
I'm right there with you ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Are other parts of the site being affected? I can’t access Website Pages.
What error are you seeing?
We are aware that HubSpot is currently unavailable. I recommend checking <https://status.HubSpot.com/> for updates. Our team is working on it.
Don't want to jinx anything, but I'm online...
I was just going to ask if we still have access does it mean our work might not be saved?
Same here
yeah looks like it’s back up
Glad to hear it!
You can check in your JS console if the save requests are going through. I believe it notifies you if there is an issue with saving your content
